channel.title: Brownian movement on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Brownian movement on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] [Introduction to simulation] I tried playing by simulating corona infection ♬
item.description: In the field of numerical calculation, there have been simulations of free-moving particles and collective movements of Brownian particles in the past. This time, I will apply this to a simulation of coronavirus infection. There is PSO as a similar simulation, but this time I referred to these python codes. 【reference】 ・Particle swarm optimization (PSO) parameters ・Saved particle swarm optimization (PSO) what you did ・Code explanation ・Dependence on infection rate ・Dependence on particle density ・Particle motion dependence
